title: Risotto with Italian Sausages (Risotto con Salsiccia)
description:
Quick, easy to make and super tasty, this risotto with Italian sausages (risotto con salsiccia) is a one-pan recipe that’s perfect for busy weeknights. With lots of flavour from the sausage and fresh rosemary, this Italian sausage risotto is sure to become a family favourite.

See the whole recipe at: https://skinnyspatula.com/risotto-italian-sausages-risotto-salsiccia/
